nodejs.startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [[ ! -z ${UNNODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall ${UNNODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install; fi; if [[ "${MAIN_FILE}" == "*.js" ]]; then /usr/local/bin/node "/home/container/${MAIN_FILE}" ${NODE_ARGS}; else /usr/local/bin/ts-node --esm "/home/container/${MAIN_FILE}" ${NODE_ARGS}; fi

python.startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ "{{AUTO_UPDATE}}" == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -z "{{PY_PACKAGES}}" ]]; then pip install -U --prefix .local {{PY_PACKAGES}}; fi; if [[ -f /home/container/${REQUIREMENTS_FILE} ]]; then pip install -U --prefix .local -r ${REQUIREMENTS_FILE}; fi; /usr/local/bin/python /home/container/{{PY_FILE}}
